import React from 'react'; function Section8({ formData, updateFormData, onNext, onPrev }) { const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onNext(); }; const isFormValid = () => { return formData.accidentDate && formData.accidentTime && formData.accidentLocation && formData.plannedStartTime && formData.plannedEndTime && formData.injuryType && formData.accidentDescription && formData.wasFirstAidGiven !== '' && formData.investigatingAuthority && formData.wasMachineryInvolved !== ''; }; return (
